babel-plugin-syntax-decorators

Allow parsing of decorators.

Installation

sh $ npm install babel-plugin-syntax-decorators

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

json { "plugins": ["syntax-decorators"] }

Via CLI

sh $ babel --plugins syntax-decorators script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["syntax-decorators"] });
